content:
I took a stab at recreating the tables from https://www.hl7.org/fhir/patient.html with FQL. Here's the page: https://simplifier.net/guide/FQLDemonstration/Home/Patient.guide.md (a bit slow, but published guides won't have that given that they're precalculated).

You can see and download the source file here: https://simplifier.net/firelyquerylanguage/patient
